member.name: PAGESET
member.summary: Identifies one or more page-ranges to be printed and, optionally, identifies only the even or odd pages as part of a pageset.

member.name: PAGESET.cbStruct
member.summary: The number of bytes in this instance of the PAGESET structure. This member must be a multiple of 4.

member.name: PAGESET.fOddPages
member.summary: If TRUE, only the odd-numbered pages in the page-set indicated by rgPages are to be printed.

member.name: PAGESET.fEvenPages
member.summary: If TRUE, only the even-numbered pages in the page-set indicated by rgPages are to be printed.

member.name: PAGESET.cPageRange
member.summary: The number of page-range pairs specified in rgPages.

member.name: PAGESET.rgPages
member.summary: Pointer to an array of structures specifying the pages to be printed. One or more page ranges can be specified, so long as the number of page ranges is the value of cPageRange. The page ranges must be sorted in ascending order and must be non-overlapping.
